titleStmt.title: The swearer's doom; or, A discourse setting forth the great sinfulness and danger of rash and vain swearing. By John Rost M.A. rector of Offwell and Gittisham in Devon
titleStmt.author: Rost, John, d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns, the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers-Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Misattributed in Wing to John Ross.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Three Crowns, the lower end of Cheapside
